Class.Name: GenericManager
Class.Description: A collection of generic design patterns, mostly from the 'Gang of Four' book.

Function.Name: add
Function.Description: Adds an object to the collection

Function.Name: remove
Function.Description: Removes an object from the collection

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Finds a matching object in the collection

Function.Name: size
Function.Description: Returns the number of objects in the collection

Function.Name: clear
Function.Description: Removes all objects from the collection

Function.Name: for_each
Function.Description: Iterates through each object in the collection

Function.Name: for_each_first
Function.Description: Iterates through each object in the collection for the first successful call
